title: For Sale:  Gorgeous Browning Lightweight BLR '81 Takedown-LOT
location: Burlington, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
This is a new BLR '81 Takedown model that is in perfect condition. Anything that looks like a flaw is due to a glare from the lighting, bluing and stock are shiny and perfect as it came from the factory. It has been shot ONE time to confirm function and accuracy, and it was spot on for me! Chambered in the versatile caliber of .300 Winchester Magnum famous for its' power and flat trjectory. Ammo diversifies it for deer up to anything America offers. It comes with it's original box, a Browning original Cimarron soft side takedown case for easy transport, and also includes 2 boxes of shells minus the 1 used to confirm function and accuracy. Retails for $1099, and the case for $49.00 and of course the ammo, you can save hundreds today!! This is a beautiful, and near perfect gun for hunting and lever actions ane growing more popular for home defense in lighter loadings. Photo ID required and exchange of contact information.


Compact and easy to transport, the BLR Lightweight ’81 Takedown can be assembled or disassembled in just seconds. The gloss finish on the Walnut straight grip stock contrasts beautifully with the deeply polished blue finish on the receiver and the barrel. This is what a serious lever-action rifle should be, and what every other lever-action wishes it was.

•Every BLR barrel is individually finished with a hand-reamed chamber for tighter tolerances and more precise headspace.
•The barrel’s target-type Crown enables a more uniform release of gas as the bullet exits the muzzle, helping prevent any unwanted shift in bullet trajectory. The barrel Crown is recessed to help protect it from accidental impact damage that can degrade accuracy.
•The barrel’s standard sights include a Low-Profile adjustable square notch rear sight and a high-visibility front blade with gold bead fitted on a raised ramp-style base.?
•The richly blued steel finish on all external surfaces is a stunning reflection of the gunmaker’s art.
•The takedown models of the BLR are unique, allowing you to simply flip a finger lever, twist the receiver and barrel 90 degrees and instantly separate the two parts for space saving storage or easy transportation, even in a backpack or hunting duffle. Reassembly is in reverse order and takes only seconds.
•The barrel on BLR Takedown models is factory drilled and tapped for an optional Browning forward-mounted scout-style scope base to provide a rock-solid optics mounting platform, allowing you to remove the barrel for transportation and storage without losing your scope’s zero.
•The aircraft grade alloy receiver is precision machined to provide outstanding reliability and years of dependable service.
•The slick-sided receiver houses the BLR’s lightning fast, glass-smooth rack and pinion lever action.
•The BLR has a rotating multi-lug bolt head that locks into the barrel extension to produce bolt-action accuracy and magnum-level strength.
•The BLR is one of the few lever-action rifle designs that is strong enough to use today’s most popular magnum cartridges, giving you the extended reach and flat bullet trajectory other lever-action owners can only dream of.
•The BLR has a recessed bolt face that surrounds the cartridge head for added strength and lasting dependability.
•The BLR’s generously-sized side ejection port allows fired cases to instantly clear the action without hitting you or your scope and bouncing back onto the receiver, potentially creating a jam.
•The folding hammer on the BLR provides an added measure of safety when the hammer is at half-cock, having two positions in that mode so the status of the rifle can be instantly seen and felt.
•The folding hammer on the BLR has four basic positions; Full-cock, half-cock, folded hammer position and the dropped or fired position.
•The BLR’s trigger is unique in that it travels along with the lever as it’s cycled, meaning that pinching your fingers between the lever and trigger on closing the action is a thing of the past.
•The fingerpiece on the BLR’s trigger is nice and wide with vertical friction ribs to prevent your finger from slipping, giving you more precise trigger control for those demanding long-range shots.
•The detachable steel box magazine makes for quick reloading, both in the field and on the range.
•Unlike lever actions with tubular magazines, the BLR’s detachable steel box magazine lets you use aerodynamically-superior pointed bullets, which opens up a whole new world of ballistic performance that is usually found in bolt-action and autoloading rifles.
•Magazine capacity is 3 rounds in the magnum calibers and 4 rounds in standard calibers.
•The BLR’s stock is sculpted from fine Walnut and the cut checkering in the grip and fore-end is crisply executed for lasting good looks and a more solid grip.
•The straight grip BLR stock is true to the classic lines of the lever action rifle and has a traditional carbine strap at the fore-end.
•The BLR’s stock has a deep, glossy finish that brings out every nuance of the wood’s warm color and grain.
•The well-formed recoil pad helps reduce felt recoil and flinching.
•Steel sling swivel studs are pre-installed for easy mounting of your sling or bipod.
The button-rifled barrel is triple-checked for straightness and interior finish and then air-gauged to ensure a consistent diameter throughout the bore’s length.

I have a Savage 110BA (Military/ Law Enforcement Tactical setup) chambered in 338 Lapua Magnum( 5 round mag), unlike most of these guns you find for sale this one is Right Handed!!!!     I had the gun( and mag) professionally sand blasted and Cerakoted with a flat black and a Custom mixed gun metal gray with stainless,  the stock and rails are metallic gun metal gray while some other parts (cheek pad, bolts) are flat black.  Gun looks amazing and stands out next to a factory model especially outside.  These guns are not easy to find and you won't find a nicer set-up on Armslist. The 338 Lapua currently holds the record for longest confirmed sniper shot at 1.53 miles.  The gun speaks for itself and looks amazing in person.  The rifle has not been fired since the entire Cerakote job and was reassembled by a professional gun smith, trigger(accu-trigger) is adjustable and currently set at 3pds.  The rifle had around 40 rounds shot before the disassembly for Cerakoting.  Includes a brand new Harris bi-pod with swivel option.  This gun was more of a Hobby for me than anything and I don't need to sell it, just seeing what kind of offers I receive, these guns don't go for sale often and especially with a 10+ set-up and Cerakoted.

I have for sale one pound of Alliant bullseye powder and one pound of alliant unique powder. Bullseye is a staple for 38 special and 45 target load but works well with most other calibers. Method of Operation

• Gas Piston operated, rotating bolt (short stroke system).

• 3-position gas system for normal, suppressed, and bolt-action operating modes.

• C.R.O.S.™ (Corrosion Resistant Operating System) Nitride heat treated barrel, single-piece gas block, Nitride heat-treated gas plug, chromed gas piston, and NP3™ coated bolt carrier assembly (one-piece) all billet machined.



Bolt & Carrier

• Nickel plated 8620, integral keyed, steel bolt carrier (billet machined), heat treated/plated per MIL-SPEC.

• Roller cam pin, NP3™ coated.

• Chrome plated bolt, heat-treated to MIL-SPEC.



Upper Receiver

• POF-USA Modular Railed Receiver™ (M.R.R.™), free-floating handguard, monolithic top rail system, billet machined 7075-T6 aircraft aluminum alloy.

• 2-piece A3 flattop upper receiver.

• Oversized heat-sink barrel nut.

• Black Anodized charging handle.

postcontent:
Sold this one, but have another build planned for the near future.  Feel free to contact me if you're interested - could use your specs.

This is by far the most unique and affordable rifle in this style.  It is based on the rugged and dependable SKS barreled action and fires the 7.62x39 cartridge. Great compact package - overall length is only 33.9 inches (shorter than an AK), but with the added accuracy and muzzle velocity of a 20 inch barrel.  Awesome combination and a blast to shoot. title: For Sale:  REM 870 HOME DEFENSE W/ EXTRA BARREL AND FURNITURE
postcontent:
YOU WILL BE BASICALLY GETTING 2 GUNS (will come with original barrel and funiture so can switch back in forth in about 5 min from a home defense gun to hunting rig) .. It has had exactly 15 rounds fired.

The Rem 870 when using the pisol grip style stocks is a much better design than the Moss 500 because the Rem 870 has a CROSS BOLT safety that you can engage without moving your hands away from the trigger assembly. The Moss 500"s or like style shotguns that have the SAFETY on the reciever and when set up with pistol grips make you move you hand away from the ready fire position to engage the safety switch on top of reciever. So for a Home "D" style pistol grip shotgun the Rem 870 is a wise choose. Remember seconds count in a emergency. Enough with my rant and about this gun...

UPGRADES INCLUDE

ATI tactical adujustable stock with pistol grip. (for a Home "d" shot gun a pistol grip WITH buttstock is better for control, its much harder for someone to wrestle this away in a struggle)

REMINGTON 870 18.5" Police/law enforcement Barrel

ATI pistol forgrip

HEAT SHIELD with ghost sights. (easy sight picture, with side walls to protect sights)

SIDE SADDLE  6 shell side saddle on reciever (better then the saddle on buttstock, on the reciever it allows for much faster reloads)...

ATI rubber buttstock pad, recoil reducer

CAMO SNAKESKIN coating. (the furniture, reciever, and heat shield was done professionally, looks very good and detailed)

title: For Sale:  LES BAER POLICE SPECIAL AR-15 NIB
postcontent:
For Sale NIB Les Baer Police Special Ar-15

The Police Special is built from the ground up with all Baer-made parts, except for the pins, trigger, and plastic parts. The Police Special starts with Baer’s forged upper and lower receivers of tough, aircraft-grade 7075 T6 aluminum. The forgings are hard-anodized and precision machined, then paired up during the manufacturing process so that they can be perfectly fitted for accuracy. The lower receiver has a standard, A-2-style pistol grip and a five-position collapsible stock. Controls are standard AR fare, except for the trigger, which is the excellent modular, single-stage unit made by Timney.The Picatinny-spec upper receiver readily accepts standard 1913 scope mounts and accessories, the Police Special comes with a removable carry handle with an adjustable rear sight. The front sight is a standard, fixed unit. The Police Special’s bolt and extractor are Baer’s precision-made parts, while the carrier is a Baer mil-spec part. The 16-inch, M4-style barrel is button-rifled. It has a 1:8-inch twist for accuracy with a wide variety of bullet weights and is tipped with a standard A-2 flash hider. A bayonet lug is also standard.

Comes with box, paperwork, and (2) 30 round mags.

Asking $1350.00

HCP preferred or at least ID DL

Thank you

title: For Sale:  EOTech 557 and G23.FTS magnifier
postcontent:
The EOTech 557 Law Enforcement and Military Night Vision Holographic Red Dot Sight is ideal for use with magnifiers or night vision devices. This sight features the button operation on the side rather than the front making it much more convenient for the user, as well as a ballistic reticle designed for .223 ammunition. The base of the sight is designed to clear the delta ring and handguard on M4 style weapons which reduces the amount of rail space needed for mounting. Making this sight even more appealing is the fact that it runs on easy to find AA batteries. This sight comes with a 3x magnifier and a swing to side mount. 

Technical Information (From the Manufacturer)
Optics: Transmission holography - parallax free
Magnification: 1x
Eye Relief: Unlimited
Length/Width/Height: 5.70" x 2.1" x 2.8"
Temperature: -40 to 150 F (using AA lithiums); -20 to 140 F (AA Alkaline)
Waterproof: Submersible to 33 ft depth
Sealing: Fogproof internal optics
Adjustment (per click): 0.5 MOA (1/2" at 100 yards)
Adjustment Range: +/- 40 MOA travel
Mount: 1" Picatinny (MIL-STD-1913) rail
Return to Zero: Repeatable to 1 MOA after re-mounting
Optical Surfaces: Anti-glare coating
Window Dimensions: 1.20" x 0.85"
Front Window Material: 1/8" solid glass
Rear Window Material: Shatter resistant laminate (3/16" thick)
Field of View (100 yards): 30 yards (28m) at a 4" eye relief
Standard Reticle: AR223 BDC reticle with additional drop point dots for 400, 500, and 600 meters
Brightness Adjustment Range: 110,000:1 brightest to lowest
Night Vision Brightness Range: 1000:1 with NV switch engaged
Function Button Location: Left side near the rear of sight
Power Source: 2x 1.5V AA batteries (supports lithium, alkaline, or rechargeable)
Battery Life: 1,000 continuous hours (lithium) at nominal setting 12; 600 continuous with AA alkaline
Brightness Settings: 30 settings with scrolling feature (10 settings for NV use)
Auto Battery Check Indicator: Flashing reticle upon start-up
Auto Shut-down: At 8 hrs- programmable to 4 hrs

title: For Sale:  H&K USP 9mm compact
postcontent:
I have a gently used H&K USP 9mm compact for sale. This pistol is the model M709031-A5…USP 9 mm Compact (V1) Double/Single action trigger, safety/decocking lever on left, with two 13 round magazines.

The following information was copied and pasted from the H&K website and describes this pistol in depth. 
The HK USP Compact is a small frame pistol capable of firing the most powerful cartridges in 9 mm, .40 S&W, .45 ACP, and .357 SIG (by special order). Based on the full-size USP models, these handy pistols combine compact size with optimum effective shooting performance.

USP Compacts are smaller and lighter than large frame USPs. The reduction in trigger reach and grip circumference increases concealability and enhances shooting ergonomics. Unlike some subcompact semiautomatic pistols that use a difficult to shoot "two-finger grip" frame, the USP Compact uses a narrow, full-hand grip frame with a choice of interchangeable extended or flush-fitting magazine floorplates. This makes the pistol easy to shoot without sacrificing concealability.

Like their large frame predecessors, USP Compacts are designed with the demanding needs of the law enforcement and military shooters in mind. Using a modified linkless Browning-type action, the USP Compact is built to take the punishment of high-energy +P loads.

To reduce the length of the slide and barrel on the USP Compact, the mechanical recoil reduction system found on large frame USPs has been replaced by a specially designed flat compression spring contained in the captive recoil spring assembly by a polymer absorber bushing. Service life is still engineered to exceed 20,000 rounds.

Easy to shoot, simple to maintain; the USP Compact is a reliable, safe, accurate, and highly concealable pistol.

Come check this gun out @ The Arms Room in Fayetteville. If you have any questions about this pistol please give me a call at 479-445-six4eight0. Shipping is available. Thanks for looking.
